name: Lead Plating
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Kobolds of Golarion. © 2013 Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, F (an ounce of lead)
target: a creature or object weighing up to 100 lbs./level
text: You enclose the target in a thin sheath of lead. This doesn't restrict the target's movement or functionality, but protects it from the effects of radiation and prevents the penetration of many divination spells. The lead doesn't coat the target's equipment.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材 (一盎司的铅)
target_zh: 一个生物或物体，至多重100磅/等级
savingThrow_zh: 意志，通过则无效 (无害，物体)
text_zh: 你用一层薄薄的铅套包住目标。这不会限制目标的移动或是能力，但能从辐射效果中保护目标，并防止许多预言系法术的渗透。这层铅不是涂在目标的装备上。
